title: PinkPantheress Announces Fall 2025 North American Tour
description: Spend an evening with PinkPantheress later this year
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Spend an evening with PinkPantheress later this year
text: PinkPantheress has announced a tour in support of the new mixtape Fancy That. Her tour, called An Evening With PinkPantheress, takes place in North America in the autumn. The shows will follow PinkPantheress’ imminent Glastonbury debut and a pair of concerts at London’s O2 Academy Brixton. See all of the artist’s upcoming tour dates below.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
PinkPantheress has announced a tour in support of the new mixtape Fancy That. Her tour, called An Evening With PinkPantheress, takes place in North America in the autumn. The shows will follow PinkPantheress’ imminent Glastonbury debut and a pair of concerts at London’s O2 Academy Brixton. See all of the artist’s upcoming tour dates below.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

PinkPantheress: An Evening With PinkPantheress Tour

PinkPantheress:

06-27 Somerset, England - Glastonbury Festival
09-18 London, England - O2 Academy Brixton
09-19 London, England - O2 Academy Brixton
10-24 Brooklyn, NY - Kings Theatre
10-25 Brooklyn, NY - Kings Theatre
10-27 Toronto, Ontario Massey Hall
10-29 Toronto, Ontario Massey Hall
11-01 Chicago, IL - Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom
11-05 Los Angeles, CA - The Wiltern
11-06 Los Angeles, CA - The Wiltern
11-12 San Francisco, CA - The Masonic
11-13 Oakland, CA - Fox Theater
